special_ability.Antimagic medalion: Have no damage from magic type attaks.

special_ability.Ambash: When opponent play unit card, elf scout hit it.
When you play the card, choose card if it yours - heal them for 4 hp, if eneme's - inflict 4 damage to it.

special_ability.Tactical blow: When you play the card, it inflict X damage to all opponent's card, where X is half of hp of the card.

special_ability.Aviation: When it's aim of spell, spell redirect to another random card. Can't redirect redirected spell or if it's the only one card

special_ability.Lucky blessful: When you play the card, it increase players mana power by 1.

special_ability.I need dudes: Spawn elf warrior (3/9) at the specified slot

special_ability.Ambash: When you play the card, heal owner by 5 hp.
